```{r}
#Create and test interpolation function 
temp_ref  <- 5
TT <- c(1,2,3)
temp <- c(0,10,20)

int_func <- function(temp,TT,TT_ref){
  
 tryCatch(  
   
  out <- approx(TT, 
  temp, xout = temp_ref, rule = 1)$y,
  error = function(e) 
  {
  out <- NA
  }
) 
return(out)  
}
int_func(TT,temp,temp_ref)


```

```{r}
#create REF 

TTfunc <-
function(Tmax , Tmin){         
  
  x<-0
  for(n in 1:8){  
    x <- ((0.931 +  0.114 * n - 0.0703 * n^2 + 0.0053 * n^3) * (Tmax-Tmin)) + Tmin
    Td <- Td+x
    
    }

  return(Td)
  
  }

TTfunc()
```
